bib.title: Norm emergence via influential weight propagation in complex networks
bib.author: Shibusawa, Ryosuke and Sugawara, Toshiharu
bib.abstract: We propose an influence-based aggregative learning framework that facilitates the emergence  of social norms in complex networks and investigate how a norm converges by learning  through iterated local interactions in a coordination game. In society, humans decide to their .
